actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To urge the President to initiate consultations with the Governments of Singapore, Australia, and New Zealand to determine the feasibility and desirability of negotiations to create a free trade area between the United States and those countries.

summary.text: Urges the President to initiate consultations with the Governments of Singapore, Australia, and New Zealand to determine the feasibility and desirability of entering into negotiations with them to create a free trade area between them and the United States.

titles.title: To urge the President to initiate consultations with the Governments of Singapore, Australia, and New Zealand to determine the feasibility and desirability of negotiations to create a free trade area between the United States and those countries.
